ending (optional)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
Jesus is King
and I will extol Him
Give Him the glory
and honor His name

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
He reigns on high
enthroned in the heavens
Word of the Father
exalted for us

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
We have a hope
That is steadfast and certain
Gone through the curtain
And touching the throne

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
We have a priest
Who is there interceding
Pouring His grace on our lives
Day by day

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
We come to Him
Our Priest and Apostle
Clothed in His glory
And bearing His name

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Laying our lives
With gladness before Him
Filled with His Spirit
We worship the King

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
O Holy One
our hearts do adore You
Thrilled with Your goodness
We give You our praise

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Angels in light
with worship surround Him
Jesus our Savior
forever the same

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Jesus is King
and we will extol Him
Give Him the glory
and honor His name
He reigns on high
enthroned in the heavens
Word of the Father
exalted for us
